description: does what it says it does, looks very good
summary: works very good, no problems here

description: Rythmbox skips like everysecond track when listening. TAUON just works, love it

Works so good! Really like the thing that it gets our folders as albums. Some icons like the shuffle button should be changed though. Also would be great if the showcase mode and mini, micro views are made more accessible.

Definitely recommended!
but it displays the Play button when the music and playing and it displays the Pause one when the music is on pause it should be the inverse or at least it should be an option to modify that
If you organize your music with folders then Tauon is amazing with the ability to drag and drop with ease. Thank you!
I could not get it set up in the way as displayed in the app store. Not very intuitive so I uninstalled it.

This has fast become my absolute favorite music player. Looks sweet, with a bunch of cool color themes.
There's a bit of a learning curve to get the playlists and other stuff set up and not messing it up afterwards, but overall I really like it. Very much worth a cup of coffee!
summary: Good looking, works like a charm

description: Cannot drag folder to the icon, or when open if I click on a folder it closes it's window and I have no where to drag the folder. I cannot find any way to add a source.......
summary: Cannot drag and drop or open source

description: Good start but lots of work to do. Text is too small and once you increase pas a certain point everythign turns into squares. Lots of extraneous and unnecessary options
Forget Lollypop, this is on another level. Folder support is actually what makes it superior. Just drag and drop and your playlist is ready. Android remote is so cool as well. Just try it.
best music browser on Ubuntu too bad it only exist in snap version so I avoid downloading it

Has some issues playing tracks from shared storage.
Like most of these media players. Drag and drop tracks from shared folder also an issue.
i liked it good app

I am confused. The UI is not good. I can not figure out how to do simple things out of the gate such as sorting music and such and more? The app seems to be missing A LOT. Maybe it's better at playing music streams but if that's the main draw of this app then just say that. All I wanted was an app that could play my music library and for me to be able to easily navigate my collection but this app offers none of that. Sorry developers. This app needs more development.
summary: Huh?...Why is does this app get high ratings?

description: lo instale, las imagenes se ve bien, pero no inicia
Bastante dinámica, vérsatil y buena apariencia.
summary: Muy buena aplicación, no tengo quejas

description: en ubuntu 20 04 me ha funcionado genial, la calidad de reproduccion es excelente, la fluidez, las letras de canciones y los servicion de calificacion y lastfm, todo muy bien.
summary: el mejor reproductory mas completo para linux

description: Muy bueno y sencillo, te muestra la caratula y la informacion de las canciones, tenia tiempo buscando un reproductor de este tipo. Muchas gracias a los desarrolladores por tan buen aporte.
un agradable entorno y funcional...
funciona muy fluido, carga rapido la biblioteca, buenas opciones de personalizacion y visualizacion integrada de letras, gran calidad de sonido activando el ecualizador.
el mejor de linux, muy moderna y configurable la interfaz, compatible con pulseaudio indicando la funcion en menu de configuracion etc.
moderna y buena apariencia . radio por internet buenisima
No es un programa amigable, se congela.
elle est assez fluide et interactive

Fonction de recherche vraiment innovante, lecteur moderne, très fluide , très rapide.
Des visualisations au choix .Supporte les disques réseaux.
J'ai longtemps cherché un lecteur de ce genre , je l'ai enfin trouvé.
Attention , il a encore des petits bugs mais il est largement fonctionnel.
Je recommande
summary: Le meilleur des lecteurs de musique

description: Il fait le boulot, plein de petites fonctions sympas. Fluide, rapide. C'est adopté.
summary: En attendant le Browser Art Cover de Rhytmbox

description: Fait le travail et est très agréable dès lors que l'on fouille dans les paramètres ... à première vue, on pourrait penser que ce player ne contient rien d'interressant et qu'il parait même un peu fragile ! Il n'en est rien, des parmetres excellents, des thèmes assez bien, dont mon préféré, le thème qui change avec les pochettes d'albums... on peut aussi diffuser sur le web et être rejoint par des auditeurs... Bref, j'ai adopté ce player !
add russian language
Братик, учи английский)
В определенном смысле, попа горит от странного предустановленного плеера в ubuntu. А этот напоминает aimp... работает.
